name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: This ergonomic office chair provides lumbar support and adjustable height. Ideal for long hours of work.

name: Modern Lounge Chair
description: A modern lounge chair with a sleek design, perfect for living rooms or offices. Comes with a soft cushion for extra comfort.

name: Leather Executive Chair
description: High-back leather executive chair with padded armrests and adjustable reclining. Suitable for office executives.

name: Mesh Back Task Chair
description: Mesh back task chair with adjustable lumbar support and a breathable design for enhanced comfort during work.

name: Accent Armchair
description: Stylish accent armchair with a sturdy wooden frame and comfortable fabric upholstery, perfect for any room decor.

name: Recliner Chair
description: Comfortable recliner chair with a manual lever, padded seat, and backrest for maximum relaxation at home.

name: Dining Chair Set of 4
description: Set of 4 modern dining chairs with upholstered seats and wooden legs. Durable and easy to clean.

name: Swivel Bar Stool
description: Adjustable height swivel bar stool with a footrest and cushioned seat. Great for kitchen counters or home bars.

name: Outdoor Patio Chair
description: Weather-resistant outdoor patio chair made from durable plastic. Stackable design for easy storage.

name: Kids Study Chair
description: Colorful and adjustable study chair for kids with a comfortable cushion and back support, designed for study desks.
